Reviews.Title: Nice but needs some simple work to look realistic
Reviews.Author: Steve K.
Reviews.Content: This dummy security camera looks pretty realistic but it needs some simple modifications that should've been done by the manufacturer.The brand name "UniquExceptional" is printed on the front of the security camera. If you google UniquExceptional you'll find that all they sell is dummy security cameras. I don't need my fake security camera advertising a fake security camera company. The good news, some 400 grit sandpaper will remove their name in a matter of seconds. It'll also leave a little dull spot on the housing but that's something I can live with.The second issue is with the dome for the security camera. Dome security cameras, like this one, are a dome shape for a pretty simple reason; so you can't tell which way the camera is facing and therefore can't tell what area is under surveillance by the camera. The dome on this security camera is clear. It may look like it's blacked out in pictures because the camera inside follows the same dome shape in black plastic but the dome itself is clear. Inside the clear dome you can clearly make out the false camera lens. This leaves two problems, first, in a real dome security camera, you'd never be able to see a camera lens, and second, people that can see the lens would believe they know which area is being watched and may try to hide in the dead spots around your cameras. There's another quick fix for this one too. The dome is assembled with four small phillips head screws. Simply disassemble and hit the inside of the dome with a little black spray paint and you've got a very believable blacked out dome just like you'd see on a professional unit.Finally, dome cameras would never have a red flashing light like a handheld video camera from the '90s. Of course, now that you've blacked out your dome no one would ever know even if you did bother to put batteries in the camera but, had the manufacturer blacked out the dome in the first place, they surely could have saved us a few dollars by not including the flashing light, or even the entire false lens piece of plastic all together.But, once you've made these small modifications, you've got a pretty good looking dummy security camera.

Reviews.Title: Really nice for the money..
Reviews.Author: Blair LaMere
Reviews.Content: I install real working cameras as a sideline. There's a lot of dummy cameras that wouldn't fool your ancient grandmother. These domes look exactly like a working Axis PTZ unit. For the price, it's well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Small, so it's not gaudy, just big enough to be noticed
Reviews.Author: Jewvonne
Reviews.Content: And having a white plastic housing, it's easy to keep clean. Looks just like those dome security cameras you see at the casinos and hotels, but a bit smaller. Used with signs and window stickers warning of security cameras on the premises, it sure does look convincing.

Reviews.Title: Fake but the result is real!
Reviews.Author: geekay
Reviews.Content: I love this fake security camera! So easy to install and though it's not real, the results seem pretty real to me. Unless you tell somebody its "secret", nobody I think will really know unless it's physically dislodged and disassembled.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Apollo legend "Apollo legend"
Reviews.Content: One of the neighborhood kids decided to open one of my Amazon packages on my door step. Installed this camera and the sticker in the window and the problem has stopped. Looks legit, the blinking light will get your attention and the CCTV sticker will do the rest.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a camera!
Reviews.Author: PflipUp "Digital."
Reviews.Content: The look is exactly like a camera.  I have had several people comment on the new camera I installed, and said people better watch out. I do have 1 complaint.  It takes batteries for the light to blink steady. The batteries died within 10 days twice. I do not plan on changing them again, as the batteries will quickly cost more than the camera.  Overall I am pleased with what it is supposed to do, and that is look like a camera.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: zintman
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of these jewels to place on my shop, back door, and front of my house. Everyone that has seen the security lights think they are real. I recommend the item to anyone looking to let it be known you have security without the hefty price tag associated with real security cameras.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Product !  Good Quality !
Reviews.Author: Karen Webber
Reviews.Content: After reading all of the positive reviews we purchased this to supplement our existing outdoor security.  This works exactly as described!  It works perfect!  Will be purchasing at least one more! I was very surprised at the high quality of the item.

Reviews.Title: Looks authentic
Reviews.Author: gtbking
Reviews.Content: This camera does appear quite realistic.  I put one under my boat house and one under my carport.  Have not had them long enough to tell how battery life will be.  I connected them to an electrical box with conduit running to it for more realism.  I am satisfied with my selection.

Reviews.Title: Very real except for one easily correctable function... THE BLINKING LIGHT
Reviews.Author: Challenger "The best computer in the world is...
Reviews.Content: Being 60+ years old now I can confess to being a wild teenager. In those days we were acting out by slipping into construction sites at night and starting up the big machines that all boys wanted to drive. We just moved them about a bit and sometimes parked them nose to nose or blocked the driveways to cause a little 'fun' for the morning crew. Nothing too serious and never hurt anyone or anything. Still, we did not want to get caught so we quickly learned the ins and outs of security systems. We knew what was real, what was real but not installed correctly, and what was fake.We also learned the brand names for all of the security gear and which ones could be messed with and those not to mess with.  Kids learn quick and we soon became experts.I received my "UniquExceptional UDC6 Outdoor Dome Fake Security Camera with BLINKING LIGHT" only two days ago and it looks VERY real except for that BLINKING LIGHT. All real security cams that I know of, in a dome or not, do not have blinking lights. The logic of the security industry is that if all functional cams had a blinking light then the thieves could quickly pick out which ones were not activated or functional. Obviously that would not work so they just don't have them.The exception might be if you want people to see a blinking light from a distance so that they will know someone is up.  If so I suggest buying a fake keypad for your doors. They are expected to have blinking lights and most come with blinking lights. We have one and the batteries last two years.We will use our fake dome without the batteries so NO BLINKING LIGHT. I also used a black magic marker to cover the brand name as all pros, and most semi-pros, will know the brand name of every fake cam out there. As kids we knew what worked by brand name, and what did not work. We avoided those that had the 'right' brand name.Otherwise this little gimmick will do the job very well. We have a rent house in Houston and will be using in there. Just to be safe we also bought a very reasonably priced 'real' security system to install inside the house. It is wireless, offers inexpensive monitoring without any contract, has battery back up, and uses cell phone data circuits so the intruder cannot defeat it by cutting your phone line. If interested see the 'simplisafe' web sight. I think Amazon also carries their stuff.Best of luck!The following is from a leading security team that I cannot name here:Red Security Lights:The second thing to watch out for on fake security cameras is red lights. This feature is designed to draw attention to the camera and give the impression that the camera is recording, though these lights appear almost exclusively on fake cameras. The only lights on actual security cameras are green ones that indicate the camera has power. These are hidden in the back and are only a reference for owners and technicians. A flashing red light is actually a beacon to criminals, signalling that the home or business has no real security protection.Panning Cameras:Movement patterns are another difference between real and fake cameras. Many dummy camera manufacturers advertise a motor that turns the camera from side to side. However, very few real security cameras have a swivel mechanism, and the ones that do are typically designed to track the movement of people nearby, not simply pan back and forth. As with the red light, this feature may seem to add authenticity to a fake security system, but it instead reveals a camera’s artificial nature to criminals.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Linda S. Smith
Reviews.Content: I've mounted this in an unlighted long, narrow driveway leading to a small private parking lot & my apartment entrance above commercial property in the business district of a small walkable community. There are numerous restaurants, music venues (bars), movie theater and bowling alley in a 2-block area where my apartment is located. The camera has proven to be a very effective deterrent to loitering and other undesirable activity in this area.

Reviews.Title: Dummy IR camera VG-CD27
Reviews.Author: Grimone
Reviews.Content: Just received and installed 3 of these realistic cameras. I'm completely satisfied with this product, I've decided not to install the batts. as most outdoor cameras don't have a blinking red light. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for more security.

Reviews.Title: SERIOUSLY FLAWED
Reviews.Author: George Herris
Reviews.Content: For a few weeks I was completely satisfied with the pair of fake $14 security cameras. Then I noticed that the led was not blinking on either of the units that I installed. A major part of the cost and reason to buy this type of unit is the blinking led feature. The battery voltage required to make the led blink is too high. The nominal voltage for a pair of fresh alkaline batteries is about 3.2 volts. The nominal voltage for a pair of freshly charged rechargeables is about 2.7 volts.The led will not blink at 2.7 volts. In other words, It will not work with rechargeables; you will need fresh alkaline batteries every few weeks. One reviewer said his lasted 10 days.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real deal. But it needs distance to be believable.
Reviews.Author: No B.S. "onesock"
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks like the real thing. But just like many other things in life, the farther away from it you are, the better it looks. So keep that in mind when you place it where ever you feel you need it to be seen. The minute you touch it, so ends the deception. I'll be interested to see what the sun and weather will do to it. But for the cost of it, I can afford to replace every few years.

Reviews.Title: This item is alright from a distance or located up high.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Randall
Reviews.Content: This item is best when viewed from a distance and in the dark, The blinking light works best in low light conditions as it is located behind the smoked glass dome. If you get a real close look at the device however, the ALL plastic construction of the camera and the mounting bracket, plus the absence of a power cable is a giveaway for an amateur thief I would assume. I'm certain it would not fool my youngest step-brother. For the money though, if you place it right, it would make one think twice as many combine real camera's and fake camera's together to get more bang for the buck. As for battery life; I used Duracell Copper Top in mine and they lasted 10 weeks. Changing them is as easy as twisting off the lens which is water tight. Be careful!!! Handle with care as it is only plastic.

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: N. D. Krustchinsky
Reviews.Content: I ordered a few of these in different styles.  Very impressive.  Very well constructed.  Have been installed and looks just like the real ones...!  My installer said he was impressed too. I would purchase these again and would recommend them.

Reviews.Title: .Very realistic!
Reviews.Author: Ognat
Reviews.Content: Looks very realistic both in size and overall appearance.  Mounted it on a dock onto a box with a (fake) antenna on it and it looks like a real CCTV camera!

Reviews.Title: wow!
Reviews.Author: the truth and nothing but the truth
Reviews.Content: this camera look so good, sometimes i get confuse lol.. people stop coming near my front door at night ill tell you that

Reviews.Title: It looks great!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I placed one in the front of the house and and one in the back and they look amazing. The blinking lights give it a real look to them and I have neighbors asking if I have to pay monthly or not. HaHaHa! Keep them guessing until we can afford a real ones. Overall I love them.

Reviews.Title: DOME SECURITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: James  North
Reviews.Content: This camera is doing what is suppose to do. It is working just fine, have had no problems, and it looks very real, I have real cameras, and you can not tell them apart, by looking at them. I reccomend  this Camera. Jim in Ohio.

Reviews.Title: Really looks real
Reviews.Author: Barataria
Reviews.Content: I almost didn't get this fake camera because of the negative reviews but I am glad that I decided to buy it.  I installed it myself on the ceiling and boy does it look real!  I have noticed a few customers peaking at it when they notice the sign I posted giving notice that we have a camera in use.  You barely notice the blinking light but the light does give it an ear of reality I think, instead of the opposite as noted by the reviews.  It just shows that it is working.  Hopefully it gives us a bit of protection until we can afford the real thing.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made
Reviews.Author: Bonita Tripp
Reviews.Content: When I first received these cameras one was broken in the box even though the box was not broken or crushed in any way.  They are cheaply made but when mounted they would almost certainly do the job.  Unfortuantely I was unable to use them and when I complained about them & asked for a new one to be shipped to replace the broken one I was ignored!

Reviews.Title: Money well spent
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I put one of these cameras at the back of my house. Within 24 hours the Police were knocking at my door. My neighbours were so paranoid that they were being spied on they phoned the police, trust me they are just flattering themselves.I guess this is what you would expect from small town mentality.When the officer arrived he even thought the camera was real.This dome cameras is excellent value for the price

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Julialynn psychic
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I live in an iffy neighborhood in NYC. It works very well. I dont understand the battery option though. These things are built to hang high. HOw am I supposed to reach the damn thing to change the batteries?  I had a man with a ladder do me a favor and hang it for me so I did not bother with the batteries because the ones in the subway and in govt buildings do NOT have a red light so I started thinking that the red light is a giveaway its fake. I am buying another one for over my door and entry area. Worth the price. the bad guys noticed it fast enough and little thefts like stealing my outside clothes line have stopped.

Reviews.Title: It works...
Reviews.Author: St. Nick
Reviews.Content: The noisy neighbor is worried that I am spying on him...good, stay off my property.  Inexpensive protection in today's world.

Reviews.Title: Good looking and looks real. But the battery runs out fast
Reviews.Author: J. B.
Reviews.Content: A pair of AA batteries lasts only a couple months. I have to remember to change them. In general, good to add some look of extra security to the house.

Reviews.Title: Got my eye on you
Reviews.Author: Jimbob
Reviews.Content: No burglaries yet. Drive up to the garage door and this product is a glaring reiinder of who may be watching you. We live in a residental area and the youth look point and move on.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent
Reviews.Author: cbreeze
Reviews.Content: I installed one above my garage door facing the driveway. It looks real and a great deterrent. I didn't bother to put in any batteries for blinking lights. If you look at the real security cameras in stores and in banks, there are no blinking lights.

Reviews.Title: Looks legit.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: After a burglary, I put this over my garage to make it look like I have complete coverage of the front area of my house.  This unit looks pretty convincing even as you get pretty close.  I'm going to call mine a half-successful case.  My house didn't get robbed again, but they did take (as in took with them) the bulbs out of my front porch lights though, right under the camera.  I don't blame the camera, because I think it looks pretty real.  Maybe the culprits were darkening the area, and then left when they saw the camera.  Or maybe they didn't care.  Or maybe they knew it was fake.  Or maybe the fact that I had red, blue, and green porch bulbs in during the end of January had something to do with it.  Maybe my neighbors hate Christmas, or thought it was too late into the season for colored bulbs, lol.  Or...somebody was jealous of my $4 bulbs and decided to re-gift them on my behalf.  I kinda wish the camera was real now, ha!

Reviews.Title: Looks Professional
Reviews.Author: John J. Bejshak
Reviews.Content: I ordered this dome camera looks real from a distance's the decal this dummy camera came with was completely worthless.. I added some electrical conduit next to the cam for a realistic-look and now it's up and running. Our building is full of real cameras but a few dummy-cams all who see them would assume there all real. Best advice is to leave the battery's out!Good purchase when you can't decide what to buy

Reviews.Title: Good price and looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: CH
Reviews.Content: There is an actual camera lens inside the dome, and once attached it looks like the real thing. For the price it's a very good investment. My only complaint is the logo etched on the housing - we scratched it off. Anyone casing for a break-in could research the brand and learn that it's a dummy. (We are not using the blinking light because we don't want to change the battery all the time and don't think that the light adds much to its effectiveness)

Reviews.Title: Fool them good
Reviews.Author: Chris K Stark
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing from afar.  Hopefully the meth head burglars will think twice to enter my castle. I see you.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferreira
Reviews.Content: When I look at this product look like it's real thing and I put it up and it does look like a real that's why I bought it and I recommended

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: My only problem with anything now a days is the burglar can loo up the product on his phone before he decides to rob you just to check to see if the product is real.  As I know there are not any security cameras that have a blinking light.I want them to be seen from the road so nobody bothers to stop and wonder if the place can be robbed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent decoy battery lasting more than two months one alkaline
Reviews.Author: Adolfo M. Solorzano P-A
Reviews.Content: Battery last more than two months very well done highly recommend even my neighbor came around and ask me how much you spent for my system I told them more than $1000

Reviews.Title: Good product overall and the install was super easy
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Noyes
Reviews.Content: looks very real/ authentic. My tenants didn't even know they were fake.  Good product overall and the install was super easy.

Reviews.Title: Looks real from a distance, I am happy
Reviews.Author: Indetrucks
Reviews.Content: Looks real enough from a glance and that's all ya really need.I didn't use batteries as I don't think the newer units blink these days.Install was easy but the provided screws are cheap cheap cheap.

Reviews.Title: Looks like it does in the ads works well
Reviews.Author: Michael A. McClaskey
Reviews.Content: Good device it looks like it does in the ad so I would recommended to anyone for this price and work with a blinking light My neighbors saw it and wondered about it and liked it.

Reviews.Title: Looks real so it does the job.
Reviews.Author: Renee'
Reviews.Content: Looks real from a distance. Dome obscures 'lens' when observed at a distance; a mope will think it's pointed at him b/c he can't see the 'lens'. I add wires/cables to mine to enhance the 'security theater'.  A red/black zip cord and a TV type coax (RG-59 or RG-58) will do that. Notch out the edge of the mounting bracket with a file a little smaller than the cables and pinch them under it when mounting. Run a few feet or more wire to some logical place it can enter the building. TIP: these things only work when you keep your trap shut about them. Don't tell anybody! they're not real, not even a trusted friend or esp a neighbor. Even those we trust can have a slip of the tongue and you've wasted time and money and your property is vulnerable again.

Reviews.Title: Great buy! Would recommend this product
Reviews.Author: Jim Eagle
Reviews.Content: Looks real and serves the purpose. Would recommend this to all who seek to deter criminal activity in their area.

Reviews.Title: YES OR NO
Reviews.Author: Man Kwan Lo
Reviews.Content: STILL HANGING UP THERE AND DOING THE JOB WHERE WE WANT IT AFTER 10  MONTHS,AND THEY ARE NOT EXPENSIVE TO HAVE ONE, YOU CAN'T REALLY FOOL THOSE PROFESSIONAL BUT IT'S ALL YOUR CHOICES

Reviews.Title: Good purchase.  Could skip the blinking lignt.
Reviews.Author: lena
Reviews.Content: Looks real.  I don't know if real security cameras have a blinking light.  Came on time in good condition. If you have a store this is a great idea.

Reviews.Title: Do not get to close
Reviews.Author: NorCal Explorer "Michael"
Reviews.Content: When I got this I thought it would fool people if it was hung up high enough so they would not be able to inspect the details of it.  Installing it up 2 stories works for the purpose it is intended for, but any lower and people would be able to see it for what it is.  Oh by the way, never install a battery to make the light blink, that is a dead give away that it is a fake.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark D.
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. Awesome anti-theft light for those who want to keep unwanted guests out of there area. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: This dome security camera is as good looking as a "real" camera.It can be mounted in most any position,and the blinking LEDis not overwhelming.I purchased 2 of these put in the 2 AA batteries,and mounted them on the outside of my home.I am verysatisified with this purchase..Frank

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny
Reviews.Author: Pete Boilard
Reviews.Content: Pretty sure this already prevented a break in... When the individual spotted the camera, he took off in a hurry...

Reviews.Title: Does not look like any REAL cameas that I can find.
Reviews.Author: Midwest3885
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these and while they do look like they COULD be real I can't find a single REAL security camera that looks at all like these. I have been trying because I actually like the look, size, and mounting of this FAKE camera but I can not find a single REAL camera that is like this FAKE. Doesn't help to have a FAKE camera that can be uniquely identified as a FAKE because there are no real ones like it. The blinking LEDs are a dead-give-away themselves. But that is easy to remedy by not putting in batteries.These will probably fool the neighbor kids but not a professional thief.

Reviews.Title: Really big
Reviews.Author: Texas1
Reviews.Content: I should have paid more attention to the dimensions in the product description.  I had wanted something to mount outside by garage but this thing is obnoxiously large, to the point of overkill.  I don't know that I've seen cameras this big in a bank or a retail store.  I didn't really think it looked like a "security" camera which is the intent.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Zstyles
Reviews.Content: These are great! They look real and do what they need to do! If your looking buy this! Great! Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Interesting iteem
Reviews.Author: Valley of The Sun "SUNSHINE"
Reviews.Content: Nice for the price. When I get to painting it. I'm sure it will look better. As is it looks cheap.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dome Fake Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: Caesar
Reviews.Content: The cameras look pretty good and you can see the fake lens behind the dome. Of course on close inspection you can tell they are plastic but otherwise from a few feet away they look real and will serve their purpsose.

Reviews.Title: well worth the money
Reviews.Author: donald young
Reviews.Content: looks like the real thing....more than pleased.....delivery was fast too......I had my van broken into 3 times in one year,in my driveway......lets hope this deters them......looks good I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very good for wide area
Reviews.Author: S. Bourque "Steve in WA"
Reviews.Content: Have minor issues with just kids. Has a 24/7 blinking red light and look very real.  Can't tell where camera points so very good deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I own a multi-family in an area where we had people dumping garbage illegally.  I purchased this camera, put up some "no dumping" signs which indicated the property was under surveillance, and have not had any issues since.  Obviously, it would be nice to have a real camera, but if you want to try your luck at a cheaper option that should deter most of the riff-raff, give this product a look.  FYI - you may or may not want to run a fake wire, so as to give the illusion that it's hooked up. Obviously there are pros and cons to this approach.  I have not run any wires and have not had any issues in 2 months after having monthly or weekly problems.

Reviews.Title: Looks good.
Reviews.Author: Jack Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Installed these in several locations and have had a policeman believe that it was a real camera.  Can you ask for more?

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: got this for my home and to keep kids from playing near my garage.,everyone asks how it works, and they actually think its real.  kids thinktwice before playing in my driveway now., received fast and as promised.works great.

Reviews.Title: Good Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I think the only one that knows this camera is fake is my family.  Don't use the blinking light because I don't feel like dealing with batteries on a regular basis. Have only had installed for a month now.  If these hold up to the UV rays of the sun well over time I will be very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake Security Light
Reviews.Author: Mytake "CiviC"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item and Installed it at the rear of the retail store, the Unit is made of cheap plastic, do not know if it will last long. The blinking light is visible in the dark and not during the day.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty cool product. Very easy installation. I plan on ordering a few more of this same item.

Reviews.Title: Faux surveillance camera serves its purpose.
Reviews.Author: B. J. Turner
Reviews.Content: Camera isn't that bad. I would imagine that most people are not looking so intently to determine if a camera is real or not. I've read most of the reviews. It seems as though most people have a hang up with the blinking light battery duration and absence of a realistic cord. You want to pay for 2 AA batts every few weeks or come home and find half your stuff missing? I did wish it had a switch to turn the blinking light on and off though. I say attach your own cord because that's what I'm going to do. Not a bad product...especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Can not put it together since product arrived broken but packing carton has no sign of damage so it must be broken before packing. Returned back to merchant.

Reviews.Title: Light blinks, but HUGE.
Reviews.Author: theus "theus"
Reviews.Content: This fake camera would probably be great on a commercial building, but on any house it would look decidedly strange because it is about the size of a basketball. My bad for not checking the dimensions, but I took one look at it and put it in the trash.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dome Fake Security camera with blinking light
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these security cameras. the first one out of the box was perfect. the second one out of the box was broken. the small screws that attach to the base one of them broke off. I had to crazy glue it in place and all was ok. other then that it was ok. Installation was relatively easy. It took me 10 minutes climb a ladder, mount the unit and install the batteries. Total 20 minutes to install both units. I bought this for a friend that has a business. it is a deterant for would be robbers. It has fooled a lot of people and am glad. When they ask where is the monitoring unit. I just point to a dell desktop and say it all records the the desktop. I love the fact each camera came with a cctv sticker so you can display it in front of the store. one is installed front of the store as you enter and the other installed back of the store. I would have given a 5 star if the 2nd unit didnt have a broken piece. For the price of 15 dollars each...overall i would recommend this unit. It looks real and has done its job well.

Reviews.Title: Really good product
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Cienfuegos
Reviews.Content: Really good product I would definitely recommend it. The look very good when installed as well as easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Haven't used yet.
Reviews.Author: Andi
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for use with an indoor camera to make it outdoor. Once you remove the "fake light" a small camera can fit. My cameras are 4"x4"x5" and do not fit. I have an old Panasonic IP camera which does fit (I used a mini-tripod connector and a longer screw), but it doesn't have night vision. Project on hold until smaller night vision camera is acquired.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money
Reviews.Author: CDZ1
Reviews.Content: The product is very poorly made and makes it susceptible to cracking or breaking.  I would not have purchased this product had I known it was so poorly constructed.

Reviews.Title: It looks so real
Reviews.Author: Adel
Reviews.Content: I do not usually right reviews, but this one looks so real in every way...The size is perfect. I bought four. Easy to mount on wood. I did not install any batteries, as I do not want people to notice when the batteries are out. Overall, I think it serves the purpose. They will surely make someone think twice before attempting to break into my house, and hope they keep out of my **"Security Cameras **** range ;)

Reviews.Title: This looks like the real deal
Reviews.Author: DANIEL
Reviews.Content: I wanted to discourage folks from going into my side yard and long driveway, so put one of these little darlings on the eave of the garage.  It looks authentic and the small led light makes the illusion complete.  If you think the little blinking light is a bit much, you don't have to put the battery in. I opted to just have it without the light, as most cameras don't have such a light.  The light would make sure it's noticed.  Good quality contruction and realisic look.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Deno
Reviews.Content: I didn't get this put up as yet but the neighbor has one and it looks to cover the who back yard. He has good remarks on his. Happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Do it.
Reviews.Author: Unobfuscated
Reviews.Content: Good price point and quality for a cheap deterrent.  Don't use blinking light.  Per most research/feedback, blinking lights are not suggestive of an operational 'real' security camera.  Install well out of reach (so that its operation/functionality/quality cannot be discerned upon closer inspection) and you should be fine.  Wear in elements if not under cover not tested, but suspect it to be comparable of that of a 'real' camera.

Reviews.Title: Gotcha!
Reviews.Author: Educator
Reviews.Content: We had a problem with a neighbor letting their dog go wherever they wanted in our well kept yard and not picking up after. We tried posting signs, even attaching poo bags. The neighbor ignored them. So, I ordered the fake cam and easily installed it under on front porch overhang. Apparently the neighbor knows what a security camera is. We have found no treasures since we installed the cam a couple of months ago. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Very Useful
Reviews.Author: Robert Brown
Reviews.Content: Mounting was easy once I picked a spot for them.  How they hold up, only time will tell.  I will update in a couple of months, unless disaster strikes before then.  Once mounted, they look just like real cameras.  People will notice the camera lense and flashing red light even in direct sunlight.If you got a real camera that would fit inside the area of this dome, these would be worth the cost as "weather" coverings for them.  It's easy enough to remove the "guts," and then drill a pass-through to the back of the mounting bracket for any wiring you need.  Considering some of the prices for "weather-proof" camera domes, I'd seriously consider this an option for a real camera.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Rodger B. Terrey "jeeping rodg"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE 5 REAL  CAMERAS  AROUND MY HOUSE 1 JUST LIKE THESE DUMMY CAMS & REALLY CANT TELL THE DIFF.!!!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: brenda gussack
Reviews.Content: Realistic looking camera...Flashing red light makes the difference...Very reasonable price and seems sturdy, which I was doubting when I ordered.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: i dont like it
Reviews.Author: liz
Reviews.Content: its looks so cheap ....not worth the price......i wouldnt recommed this item to no one ........waste of money ......disappointed ...

Reviews.Title: A good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: john lilburn
Reviews.Content: Mounted directly over garage side door which seems to be the target of forced entry at several neighbor's homes in recent years.  Eary to do and the small flashing light is quite clear at night.  Should give intruder reason for seond thought on forced entry

Reviews.Title: Look real
Reviews.Author: Honestly...
Reviews.Content: My neighbor who installs these cameras thought they were real.  You can eliminate the red blinking light by not installing a battery.  Most cameras now do not have the blinking light.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lane Jacobs
Reviews.Content: Looks real. All my neighbors couldn't believe that I put up real camaras around my house. Little do they know that they are FAUX. Look like the real deal.

Reviews.Title: Again...sometimes all you need is the appearance of Security
Reviews.Author: Ignatius Malibu
Reviews.Content: I mix fake with real just in case someone is dumb enough to come ahead anyway.  A good way to enhance your existing security and if you don't have any, its better than nothing!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: kassey
Reviews.Content: I've had this thing up for almost a year and it's still going strong. I have it out in the open just above my car port in front of my house. It's lasted through the rain, wind and dirt. This thing is durable, it even held up through the freeze that came through. The red light is still blinking and I haven't once changed the battery. I originally bought it because I had some vandalism happen a couple years ago around Halloween and Christmas when our decorations were thrown about and broken. I bought it last year to avoid what had happened the year before, and thankfully it worked!

Reviews.Title: We're watching!
Reviews.Author: Savannahfla "GF"
Reviews.Content: Looks real and the red blinking light makes it look even more authentic!  What a great deterrent for any unwelcome guest!  I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Blinking Camera
Reviews.Author: J.M. Sandler, Author of   'Caspian Diary'
Reviews.Content: Easy to Install and looks real. But, it is fake, of course. So, make sure you place it in a strategic spot. The batteries will go after a couple of months

Reviews.Title: Looks real. Fools the bad guys from robbing your place.
Reviews.Author: Bartley Wilson "Bartley Wilson"
Reviews.Content: We live in a word today that has us all being monitored. Every street corner has video cameras on the light poles keeping track of us. Banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants... they all have them.  Do they work? Apparently they do as many stores often report theft goes down considerably once people see them.What about your home or office?  Video systems can be expensive. But with this product, you hang a few of them up and they even have the red LED light flashing (which comes from a battery inside).  You know they're not real. But the bad guys...? They have no clue.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Enrique Elgor
Reviews.Content: I am surprise it okay I recommended but is not an excellent product, for the price is good tats it..

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Cabo Grupo
Reviews.Content: They look so real that it is impossible to tell which one is fake.We recommend this product.The red LED blinking light makes it so real, so hard to tell is not.

Reviews.Title: Fake Camera are so good They fake me by not working
Reviews.Author: John R.
Reviews.Content: One fake camera did not work at the other camera blinking light could only be seen in the dark  is so dim and yes the battery are new

Reviews.Title: Very excellent product looks very real
Reviews.Author: Donald Robinson
Reviews.Content: Very good product easy to install and very noticeable from the street and from the sidewalk for potential home invasions

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Diane Burke
Reviews.Content: Great deal. I recommend this to anyone needing additional coverage but still have the real one too  Thank you. Good quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent item...though be careful with installation
Reviews.Author: Rob "Rob"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these as a trial to see how authentic they look, and after installing them, I immediately placed an order for 3 more.  They are as described.  Two AA batteries powers the unit, with a flashing red LED light inside the tinted dome that alerts would-be intruders that they are ostensibly being videotaped.  The bottom half twists off so you can install the batteries, and once returned to the base, can be rotated so that the "camera" (and LED light) are facing where you want it to be. It's pretty darn convincing.  The only down side is that the plastic, particularly the part that you screw to the wall, is VERY thin.  Be careful when you attach it, as it is so thin that even the slightest over-tightening of one of the screws WILL damage the base.  I still gave it 5 stars with this limitation.

Reviews.Title: Looks authentic.
Reviews.Author: Debbie Hensley
Reviews.Content: No one has guessed it is a simulated camera, yet. Comments like, "what do you do that requires that level of security?", or "you guys really take security seriously" are common. Bought some rechargeable NiMH batteries to go with it, I change the batteries out about once a month (in cold weather). From the street, it looks like serious protection.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Icsammis
Reviews.Content: This product Looks realistic.  Not bad at all for the price!  Nice red flashing light and the angle is adjustable.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Louie
Reviews.Content: I bought them for the restaurant and no one knows that they are not real. I just told my employees they were wireless!heheNo more talking ,Texting, or watching TV from their phones/These do a great Job !!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Scares dumb kids
Reviews.Author: Francisco Coronel
Reviews.Content: Some kids threw a fruit at a window and broke it. I set this up and I once caught them waving at the camera! haha awesome!

Reviews.Title: Look GREAT
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of this cameras, 2 for my house and 1 as a gift. I currently have them placed on the corners of my house, and so far nobody has been able to tell if they are real or fake. The red LED light is very bright, visible during the day, and at night can easily be seen from the street. Exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Old EnglishMajor
Reviews.Content: This is just SO REAL LOOKING!!! And for only 10 bucks, it's a steal.  Pun intended.  Really, this is great and gives us peace of mind when we are away.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "DCI"
Reviews.Content: There were some reviewers who remarked on how fast this unit went through batteries. I would say to them - buy better batteries! I bought this "fake camera" just prior to a three month road trip last year. I set it up using a "warehouse" retailer's house brand batteries and, so far, this one set of batteries has lasted over FOUR months (and is still going strong). The unit is a keeper.

Reviews.Title: safety. Legit looking to deter lurkers.
Reviews.Author: george do
Reviews.Content: Recently broken into, I installed this over one of our rental property's front door with a surveillance poster.  Easy to install.  I attached 1/4 inch black tubing to it and put into the wall to complete the illusion of it being wired.  Legit looking with flashing red light. Cost me less than $20 for this, sign and batteries.  Peace of mind to deter any lurking opportunist.  Haven't had in issue since.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Melvey "Rick F"
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real deal. Can't beat it for the price. Batteries need to be changed every 6 weeks or so, but they are easy to change. Was easy to mount. Bought a few more for my family's homes.

Reviews.Title: Recommend it
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: It looks real, easy to install and good price. The blinking red light though is hard to see from a distance.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fake!
Reviews.Author: Richard Anderson "Rick Anderson"
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect fake!  No one will be the wiser.  I had had several friends ask me about this product as they're standing on my front porch.  I tell them that it's hooked up directly to my Macintosh!  Highly recommend this security camera!

Reviews.Title: Great fake camera!
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: For the best result, install one at the most notable position and put the real one hidden. Very long battery life!

Reviews.Title: Not Effective
Reviews.Author: Maris Arnold
Reviews.Content: It looks authentic and a friend helped me attach fake wires. But a week after it was up, someone went into my front yard and tore up a new plant. So unless you bother with batteries, it doesn't seem to be a good deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: Trent T.
Reviews.Content: It looks like the real thing from a short distance but right up close you can tell it is a fake. But, what I wanted is people to see it and hope they will assume it is the real thing and not take a chance. Worth the money.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Kulinski
Reviews.Content: I had an occasion of testing this the night I have installed it. The thieves noticed it and returned stolen goods the next day. This little thing has a  power of changing hearts (lol). Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Smile - you are on a fake camera. Good tool for your home.
Reviews.Author: Craig Schneeberger
Reviews.Content: This is the first fake security camera that actually looks like a real one. Not expensive and easy to install.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: very good quality, easy to install and the price is reasonable.
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: very good quality, easy to install, the price is reasonable and it looks like a real thing. Can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: G"
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: Superb realistic looking security ball camera.  We installed in a dark back slider door of our house and it looks terrific and deters theft.

Reviews.Title: Okay, But Batteries Drain Quickly
Reviews.Author: C. Chrystal
Reviews.Content: These things are sturdy enough and look like the real deal, but the batteries wear out too quickly given all they have to do is power a blinking light.

Reviews.Title: Great deterent. No way to tell if it is real or fake but why take the chance.
Reviews.Author: Jason "Jason"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and even my building inspector could not tell it was not real. Just another deterrent to keep the unwanted at bay.

Reviews.Title: Security Presence
Reviews.Author: Michelle from Norfolk, VA
Reviews.Content: Serves as a security presence outside the home.  Installed on my pergola in my yard - facing the home.  Great deterrence.

Reviews.Title: great quality!
Reviews.Author: VIVIAN GLOWASKI
Reviews.Content: It looks very intimidating and unsuspecting which would make somebody uncomfortable if they were thinking about doingsomething dishonest. I would highly recommend this to all.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, and does the job for the price.
Reviews.Author: B. Butler
Reviews.Content: Looks real, easy to install.  Double (AA) does not last as long as was stated and flashing light will go out when battery gives out.  Used Duracell  AA's and they did not make it very long.

Reviews.Title: Ok, but poor attention to detail
Reviews.Author: L. Burstein "larnotlars"
Reviews.Content: I guess that it is supposed to be cheap, but there are only 2 screws and 3 holes. The housing is lightweight plastic, and there isn't even a template to drill holes for the mollys. It does work so, it isn't all bad, just not very thoughtful. Another $.18 worth of effort would have made it good.

Reviews.Title: I don't know if it works...but it looks like it does
Reviews.Author: Rhodie1
Reviews.Content: We had a series of car break ins in the area and decided to try a fake security camera to see if it would deter another issue like what happened previously. Well, I dunno if it's worked or not but I like to think it helps.By the way, battery life on the supplied batteries with the unit I got have been going strong for 5 months.

Reviews.Title: good looking
Reviews.Author: bobby kuhl
Reviews.Content: Much cheaper than in the stores. Very rreal looking and easy to install.The motion sewnsor flashes make it look like it is working.

Reviews.Title: Security camera
Reviews.Author: tendy
Reviews.Content: AS soon as you see the blinking light, you think twice.  It is very impressive and does exactly what I expected.  Very happy with it.  Easy to install and to install new batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nice dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo
Reviews.Content: The looks, the feel, everything simulates like a real security camera. It is very easy to install and it looks like made of quality materials. I would recommend this to anybody who is looking for fake security surveillance camera.

Reviews.Title: Worked as intended!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I used to have the neighbors behind my home jumping over the back block wall when I wasn't home; after installing these cameras in various locations in my back yard, the problem ceased! The owners of the home behind me even came to my house and asked why I put these cameras up (he didn't know they were fake & still thinks they are 100% real), after explaining the "situation" which he denied, the problem ceased! I should have purchased these "real looking" cameras sooner!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: I only recently purchased the items and set them up to do some preventative maintenance..........if you know what I mean.With that...........so far so good.E

Reviews.Title: Looks Real at 1/4 the cost!
Reviews.Author: Nor'easter
Reviews.Content: I have a hard wired CCTV system at my house and instead of spending another 300.00 for an additional camera I placed this to look as if it was hard wired and boy it's a head turner! The letter carrier even spotted it! This is a great tool to help prevent your home from being the next break in. The item arrived in excellent condition,packed well with bubble wrap. No issues. Good sellers. I'd buy from this seller again!

Reviews.Title: another large camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen L. Cudmore
Reviews.Content: this was was huge too. in todays secruity camera technology the cameras are so much smaller and it was an odd fit on the house so I gave the camera away to a poor fellow who just had his house broken into. I hope the camera works for him

Reviews.Title: best fake security unit out there!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Bellizzi Jr. "Gonzo"
Reviews.Content: easy to mount, looks real, and very reliable, need I ask for more??  This unit looks as real as it gets, especially for the price!!

Reviews.Title: good deterrence!
Reviews.Author: L. Cedeno Villalba
Reviews.Content: Its looks pretty good installed! under roof so its not exposed to weather...it still blinks with the first battery after 4 months. other dummy, dif model after rain stoped blinkng.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Dome Camera
Reviews.Author: Micael Vitt
Reviews.Content: Works great with the sign and DUMMY Camera. Will scare anyone because it looks like the real thing. The head detective of the Arson/Bomb squad told me that the Dummys are as effective as the real cameras through his job experience.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: For the price they are not bad. They look convincing from a distance but like others have said if you can touch them you can tell they are fake. I have them placed under the overhang around 10ft off the ground and they look good. They are easy to install using three phillips screws. I used my own phillips screws since the ones that come with the kit are cheap and are not thread all the way up.

Reviews.Title: Ideal, looks better than other fake cameras
Reviews.Author: Comp Expert "Comp"
Reviews.Content: This looks far better than the traditional security cameras you see - fake, or even the cheap non-fake ones at that.  The dome cameras are concealed to where the camera is aimed by its very nature so it really gives passer-bys an eerie feeling that they are being observed.  It's an excellent value for theft prevention purposes.

Reviews.Title: Fake security camera
Reviews.Author: Ernest W. Lautsch "E. Lautsch"
Reviews.Content: We originally bought two of these, but they look so real that we invested in two more so our home looks like it's well protected.  Along with ADT, I think most burglars would give a second thought to burgling again here.

Reviews.Title: WOW! A great security item.
Reviews.Author: Leslie L. Fiatte
Reviews.Content: Fake or not, who would know. It looks absolutely like the real thing!  I love the blinking light. It goes well with the "Smile Your On Camera" sign.  I also like that it comes with a sticker that indicayes "CCTV"  Very affordable too!

Reviews.Title: practical
Reviews.Author: PaAr "11juyungo"
Reviews.Content: nice and practical this camera has helped my business,  i will recommend to some body else, its a great gift

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: The Finger
Reviews.Content: 90% of security is illusion. I really like the blinking light and it is pretty weather proof too. Love it.

Reviews.Title: It matches the expectations
Reviews.Author: S. Grill
Reviews.Content: the unit is lightweight plastic; however it should suffice as a deterrent if its mounted high enough that it can't be touched.

Reviews.Title: Looks real and easy to install
Reviews.Author: M. McDonald "Retired APE"
Reviews.Content: Went up easy and looks like the real thing.  I would recommend it.  It noticeable on the house, but not offensive.

Reviews.Title: Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Wieczorek
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras look realistic, are just the right size, and are reasonably priced. They were installed easily using the accompanying screws. We liked them so much I ordered another one. The LEDs work fine.

Reviews.Title: Soccer dude
Reviews.Author: Chris Beggs
Reviews.Content: Good product for the money .No crook would know the difference . It was installed in under a minute . I am going to buy more!

Reviews.Title: It looks realistic
Reviews.Author: j_jones "j_larson"
Reviews.Content: But the little battery driven led quit working right away.  Nevertheless it sends the right message to strangers.  You are being recorded.  We haven't been robbed since it was installed, but I'm still going to put in real cameras as I can afford them.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the safety
Reviews.Author: Richard Piazza
Reviews.Content: It is great to get more than you expect.This is a real winner.If you are looking for items like this, you just found a good one.

Reviews.Title: This is the Best Fake Ever
Reviews.Author: W. C. Staub
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these items and hung one over each door to my house.  They look good, and are the best functional fakes I have ever purchased.  That blinking light is really cool!

Reviews.Title: great product to use with really small cameras
Reviews.Author: Gilbert
Reviews.Content: great product to use with really small cameras. It may look fake but once you disassemble it and put a real wireless camera in it, it saves you a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Security camera
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: Wow, these really look real. I work in security at a casino with alot of security cameras and these are of good size and quality.

Reviews.Title: It looks real
Reviews.Author: WabanBuyer
Reviews.Content: Until you get up close to it.  Frankly, the little red light makes it look more fake.  So skip the battery.  And to further hide the fact it is fake, paint the base.  Otherwise, it is fine.

Reviews.Title: buena
Reviews.Author: kendall rodriguez
Reviews.Content: lo esperado exactamente por lo que pague, muy buena decisión, lista y trabajando en perfectas condiciones, todo indica que es una buena compra y inversión de dinero

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Bolan
Reviews.Content: This really looks real. Well, at least it does to me. It probably wouldnt deter the expert thief, but for most homes its the casual thief or opportunist you want to trick. The kind of home that would attract the 'expert' thief would probably have a sophisticated alarm system anyway I would imagine. I have had mine for 2 months now. Its been 30 degree temp. outside and its still blinking away. I just ordered a second one today

Reviews.Title: A Good Product
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described and is a functional and useful product. It is durable and long lasting in an outdoor locxation

Reviews.Title: Loved
Reviews.Author: Datina Chinda
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered he loves it because it is very deceiving to outsiders.  We love it looks really real I would recommend it.  And came very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mrs Martinez
Reviews.Content: very good, does the job. I really do reccomend this product! It looks very realistic.thank you again. I will buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price!
Reviews.Author: Elias
Reviews.Content: My title says it all! For the price You cant beat it! These cameras are very realistic. I am pleased with my purchase. They will definitely make those low life criminals think twice before breaking in.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Katz "Kathleen"
Reviews.Content: Have a large back yard, so I installed this on our shed in the back, which can be seen from the street, to detour anyone thinking of doing something not so legit and it fantastic, great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Ease of placement
Reviews.Author: K. Robert Carroll "bobcarr"
Reviews.Content: Although not the real deal this fake is just right for a quick and easy way to provide some security for our vacation home. Our power is shut down for the winter, and these look authentic. It may not stop break ins, but it may stop unwanted visitors, and force them to look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Very real looking
Reviews.Author: Sonny
Reviews.Content: My neighbors seen it displayed for my garage and they asked me how did i install it. Of course i said an electrician hooked it up for a great price and they bought it. Can fool anyone. Looks real!

Reviews.Title: Great imitation.
Reviews.Author: E. Palmer
Reviews.Content: Looks real and installs very easily. The blinking light makes the thing look even more realistic. I recommend this 100%.

Reviews.Title: Local police were inpressed!
Reviews.Author: doughboy
Reviews.Content: I don't think that the local gang that is going around breaking into homes,when no one is at home, will give my house a second look.  My local policefelt that this would definitely be a great deterent!

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Ted Hagler
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these recently.Pros:But when it all comes down to it, it's only $12. All in it looks great even from 10 feet away. You can make out the camera lens through the dome. The blinking LED light is very defined from a distance. You can rotate the actual come at any angle you need.Con:I have to say it seems they went out of their way to make the outer white casing out of very cheap plastic casing. So I'll probably have to replace it when the batteries finally die a year or two down the road.

Reviews.Title: Good  Item
Reviews.Author: GALLO
Reviews.Content: I am well pleased with my dummy camera ...I ran a wire out of the body to the garage and it looks like its wired for action.I put in batteries about 6 weeks ago and the red light is still blinking.  I put the security sticker on 4x4 piece of tile and mounted it under the eve a foot or so from the camera....My camera looks great and I think it will keep the creeps away.............

Reviews.Title: Very nice quality
Reviews.Author: BoaterD
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, and came with screws to do the job. It is so realitic that I kept reminding myself during the install that I didn't have to run full-length wires. Just ran short ones in nearby holes, so as to look like the rest of the real cameras that I have running 24/7 around the house/property. These are a good addtion to my set-up.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Looks ok, I didn't install batteries for the light to blink.  I wish the smoked glass was a little darker so you wouldn't be able to see where it's aimed.The monkey that assembled it used a power screwdriver I guess and tigned the bolt at the el-bow so tight it craked the plastic tubing.  I put a little pvc cement on it and released the pressure on the bolt and it's ok.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for area without real camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis B.
Reviews.Content: I have cameras all around my home but this fake dome filled an area not covered, perfectly.  I installed this dome very easily, and for those who are wondering, the batteries (for the blinking L.E.D. light) need to be replaced every three months (could be annoying if you put the camera out of reach).

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Judith W. Bielstein
Reviews.Content: Of the three security cameras the two large ones are good.  The small one is junk.  Wires came loose three times and when it did work it blinked extremely fast for me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Fake
Reviews.Author: incourt
Reviews.Content: People want to know if the picture goes to my cell phone. It is truly a great fake and the blinking light makes even more real.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: G. Lowe
Reviews.Content: Looks good enough for someone to think it is real.  Battery did not last long for blinker.  Easy install. No brake ins.

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Kimmi
Reviews.Content: Looks real and it will work fine, but it is quite large yet from a distance it will do the job.

Reviews.Title: It is working nicely!
Reviews.Author: Sacramento Bogie
Reviews.Content: At work we had a petty theft problem in the parking lot.  We are but one of several small companies sharing a large parking and largely 24/7 so It's hard to determine who belongs and who doesn't.  I mounted it professionally (well, kinda) and the problem stopped.  After three months of exposed outdoor use it's still "on duty".

Reviews.Title: Hard britle plastic that brakes not bends
Reviews.Author: Silverman
Reviews.Content: I am all about being cheap but for an extra 3,4 dollars I would gladly pay for some better plastic that can at least with stand the shipping. The product used such a low grade hard brittle plastic that it arrived broken in the unharmed box (the box was stronger!)and I had to return it. I could tell it would not last long outside at all.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Viking
Reviews.Content: Does not look authentic.  Not worth the few dollars it cost.  One can hardy see the fake camera inside the grey dome so discouraging potential burglers is questionable.

Reviews.Title: Get what u pay for
Reviews.Author: Vinnie
Reviews.Content: Like the title states! Cameras look fake and are very cheap plastic.. These cameras aren't fooling anyone! They are a Waiste of your time to even install.

Reviews.Title: These look real to me
Reviews.Author: Mark A. King
Reviews.Content: They are a bit more cheaply made than I was expecting, but still look real enough.  You can kinda see the "camera" thru the black globe glass and a very visible red blinking light inside the globe glass above the kinda visible camera.  The visible camera inside the globe makes this look more real than just seeing the black globe with blinking red light.  These are also a bit larger than I was expecting, but they are exactly the size as detailed in the product description.  Five inches is a pretty big white dome housing.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dome Fake Security Camera with BLINKING LIGHT
Reviews.Author: Albert L. Akiona Jr.
Reviews.Content: House hasn't been broken into or burglarized since I got it.  It seems to be working well but can't tell because it is such a short time.

ProductInfo.Features:
Can be mounted on wall or ceiling as the mounting hardware can rotate
Can be used Indoors or Outdoors
This unit does contain a continuous flashing light
The camera requires 2 AA batteries that are not included.
Each camera includes the security sticker shown.
ProductInfo.Name: UniquExceptional UDC6 Outdoor Dome Fake Security Camera with BLINKING LIGHT (choice of black or white)
